greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: If A262686(n) = 0, a(n) = 1, otherwise a(n) = 1 + a(A262686(n)), where A262686(n) = largest number k such that k - d(k) = n, or 0 if no such number exists, and d(n) = the number of divisors of n (A000005).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
xref: Number of significant terms on row n of A263271.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 29 2015
